title: DualListSelectorPane Props
description:
Acts as the container for a list of options that are either available or chosen,
depending on the pane type (available or chosen). A search input and other actions,
such as sorting, can also be passed into this sub-component.

actions.description: Actions to place above the pane. (React component or element)

children.description: A dual list selector list or dual list selector tree to be rendered in the pane. (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes applied to the dual list selector pane.

isChosen.description: Flag indicating if this pane is the chosen pane.

isDisabled.description: Flag indicating whether the component is disabled.

listMinHeight.description: Minimum height of the list of options rendered in the pane. *

onSearch.description: Callback for search input. To be used when isSearchable is true. (Function: (event: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => void)

searchInput.description: A search input placed above the list at the top of the pane, before actions. (React component or element)

status.description: Status to display above the pane.

title.description: Title of the pane. (React component or element)
